
GPX file overview
-------------------------------------------

```{r 'Find Addresses',echo=FALSE}
Nitems <- dim(crd.gpx)[1]
#First address identified:
ads.beg <- NULL;nbeg <- 1
while(!is.character(ads.beg)){ads.beg <- try(reverseGeoCode(crd.gpx[nbeg,2:1]));nbeg <- nbeg+1}
#Last address identified
ads.end <- NULL;nend <- Nitems
while(!is.character(ads.end)){ads.end <- try(reverseGeoCode(crd.gpx[nend,2:1]));nend <- nend-1}
SpltAds <- unlist(strsplit(ads.beg,", "))
CNTRY <- SpltAds[length(SpltAds)]
```
The track starts in `r CNTRY`
=================================

The **first address** found is `r paste("Point ",nbeg-1,": ",ads.beg)`.  
The **last address** found is `r paste("Point ",nend+1,": ",ads.end)`.  
The trip **strated** on `r format(min(as.POSIXct(pts$time)),"%d %B %Y %R")` and **ended** on `r format(max(as.POSIXct(pts$time)),"%d %B %Y %R")`.

```{r 'SPEED',echo=FALSE}
### LOOP FOR COMPUTING THE SPEED BETWEEN TWO POINTS
## The delay between a point and the next one are computed in 'res'
## Euclidian distance between a point and the next one are computed in 'eucl'
res  <- eucl <- NULL
res[1]  <- eucl[1] <- NA
for(i in 1:(length(pts$time)-1)){
  res[i+1] <- as.numeric(as.POSIXct(pts$time)[i+1] - as.POSIXct(pts$time)[i])
  eucl[i+1] <- spDists(matrix(pts.crd[i+1,],ncol=2),matrix(pts.crd[i,],ncol=2))
}
### SPEED in km/h
VIT <- round(eucl*3.6/res,2)
## Get rid of artifacts of high speed ( > 250 km/h) due to bad sattelite coverage
VIT[VIT>250] <- NA
#### Define colors
Ncut <- as.integer(sqrt(length(pts)))
COL.VIT <- cut(VIT,Ncut,labels=heat.colors(Ncut))

```

MAPS
================

Interactive map with Leaflet
-------------------------------   

```{r 'Leaflet map',echo=F, warning=F, message=F}
### Leaflet
crd.POP <- rbind(crd.gpx[nbeg-1,],crd.gpx[nend+1,])
POP <- c(paste("Point",nbeg-1,"(START):",ads.beg,sep=" "),paste("Point",nend+1,"(END):",ads.end,sep=" "))
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addProviderTiles("OpenMapSurfer.Roads", group = "OpenMapSurfer.Roads") %>%
  addProviderTiles("OpenTopoMap", group = "MapQuestOpen.Aerial") %>%
  addProviderTiles("MapQuestOpen.Aerial", group = "MapQuestOpen.Aerial") %>%
  addCircles(crd.gpx[,1],crd.gpx[,2], radius = 5,opacity=0.8,col='red') %>%
  addMarkers(lat=crd.POP$Lat,lng=crd.POP$Long,popup=POP,options=markerOptions(clickable=TRUE)) %>%
  addLayersControl(baseGroups = c( "OpenTopoMap","MapQuestOpen.Aerial", "OpenMapSurfer.Roads"))
#createWidget("leaflet",MyMap,width=800,height = 800)
```

Details of speed
-----------------------

```{r 'Draw histrogram and plot',echo=FALSE}
cpar <- par(bg="grey85")
plot(pts$ele,pch=".",cex=as.numeric(as.character(cut(VIT,5,labels=5:9)))
     ,main="Elevation of points (size and color representing 'speed')",
     col=as.character(COL.VIT),sub=filename,
     ylab="Altitude (m)")
summary(VIT)

hist(VIT,length(levels(COL.VIT)),main="Distribution of 'speed' (in km/h)"
     ,sub=filename,col=as.character(levels(COL.VIT))) 
par(cpar)

```
